coreAttributes.authorTag: Small engraved lettering informs you that this knife was forged by 'Norin'.
coreAttributes.name: Chef's Knife
coreAttributes.description: A comfortable chef's knife, with a blade made out of ethereal energy. It's enchanted to help enhance the user's precision.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Strike out with your knife at [npc2.name].
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unsheathe)] the knife, readying it for use.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(sheathe)] the knife before putting it away.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Thrusting out with [npc.her] knife, [npc.name] [npc.verb(make)] a precise slice at [npc2.namePos] chest; the enchanted blade passes through [npc2.her] torso to drain [npc2.her] energy!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] knife, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slice)] through [npc2.her] [npc2.arm] with the ethereal blade and [npc.verb(drain)] [npc2.her] energy!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] knife, sinking the ethereal blade into [npc2.her] shoulder and causing [npc2.herHim] to lose some energy!

missDescriptions.missText: Thrusting out with [npc.her] knife, [npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to stab [npc2.name] in the chest, but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] knife, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] knife, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
